common.disclaimer: For informational purposes only. Not a medical diagnosis.

landing.heroTitle: Know what to do next about your health —
landing.heroSubtitle: AI-powered guidance to help you decide whether to rest, see a doctor, or seek emergency care. Safe, simple, and always encouraging professional consultation.
landing.trustNotDiagnosisDesc: We provide guidance, not diagnoses. Always consult a doctor for medical conditions.
landing.trustDoctorReviewedDesc: Our information is reviewed by healthcare professionals for accuracy.
landing.trustPrivacyDesc: Your health information stays private. We never share your data.
landing.featuresTitle: How Health Navigator AI Helps You
landing.featuresSubtitle: We guide you toward the right action — not replace your doctor.
landing.featureSymptomActionDesc: Get clear next steps based on your symptoms — rest, see a doctor, or seek emergency care.
landing.featureAntibioticDesc: Learn when antibiotics help and when they don't to avoid misuse and resistance.
landing.featureEmergencyDesc: Identifies serious warning signs that need immediate medical attention.
landing.featureEducationDesc: Plain-language explanations about common conditions and prevention tips.
landing.urgencySubtitle: Based on your symptoms, we provide clear urgency levels and next steps.
landing.urgencyGreenDesc: Rest, hydration, and home remedies may help. Monitor for changes.
landing.urgencyAmberDesc: Schedule an appointment with your healthcare provider soon.
landing.urgencyRedDesc: Seek immediate medical attention or call emergency services.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Take the first step toward understanding your symptoms and getting clear, safe guidance on what to do next.

chat.title: Health Chat Assistant
chat.subtitle: Ask questions about symptoms, health awareness, and when to seek care
chat.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your Health Navigator AI assistant. I can help you understand symptoms, explain health topics, and guide you on when to seek care. How can I help you today?
chat.safetyNote: I cannot diagnose conditions or prescribe medications. For specific medical advice, please consult a healthcare professional.
chat.errorMessage: I'm sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.

library.detailDisclaimer: This information is for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always consult a healthcare provider.

about.title: About Health Navigator AI
about.subtitle: Our mission is to help you make informed health decisions safely
about.missionText: We believe everyone deserves clear, understandable health guidance. Health Navigator AI bridges the gap between confusing symptoms and knowing what to do next — without replacing professional medical care.
about.whyBuiltText: Too many people either panic over minor symptoms or ignore serious ones. We created this platform to provide calm, evidence-based guidance that helps you take the right action at the right time.
about.howAIWorksText: Our AI is trained to guide, not diagnose. It analyzes symptom patterns to suggest urgency levels and next steps, always erring on the side of caution and encouraging professional consultation when needed.
about.privacyText: Your health data is never sold or shared. We use encryption to protect your information and follow strict ethical guidelines in our AI development.
about.disclaimerText: Health Navigator AI provides general health guidance for informational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.

footer.copyright: © 2024 Health Navigator AI. All rights reserved.
